峔字的基本解释

峔
mǔ
〔慈峔〕即“慈母”，山名，在中国安徽省当涂与江苏省江宁交界处。

峔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǔ］
［《廣韻》莫補切，上姥，明。］
山名。

峔字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峔； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页310第29
【廣韻】莫補切【集韻】滿補切，?音母。慈姥，山名，在丹陽，卽今太平府。◎按《地志》：其山產竹，可爲簫管。又名鼓吹山。　【正字通】本作姥。俗作峔?。

峔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
峔字的起名意思

暂无。

峔
Basic explanation of words
峔
mǔ
〔慈峔〕 means "Mother", the name of the mountain, at the junction of Dangtu, Anhui Province, and Jiangning, Jiangsu Province, China.
峔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mǔ]
["Guangyun" do not make up cuts, grandma, Ming. ]
Mountain name.
峔
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峔; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 310 29
[Guang Yun] Do not make up cuts [Ji Yun] Full make up cuts,? Phonetic. Grandma, the name of the mountain, is in Danyang, Taiping Mansion. ◎According to "Topography": Bamboo is produced in Qishan, which can be used as Xiao Guan. Also known as advocating mountain.　【Zhengzitong】This is a grandma. Common practice?.
